sentence: Adam Kinzinger will be retiring from Congress later this year, and Liz Cheney faces a difficult primary challenge in her home state of Wyoming against Harriet Hageman, who has been endorsed by top GOP leaders like House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA).
author: Paul Bois
title: Anti-Trumpers Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger to Attend CPAC Counterprogramming' Summit

sentence: McCarthy has thrown his political weight behind Harriet Hageman, a Trump-backed congressional candidate who is challenging Cheney in Wyoming -- an endorsement that earned him plaudits on the right, a key constituency in a potential future bid for the speaker's gavel.
author: Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy calls endorsement of Cheney's primary foe a 'special case'

sentence: The most prominent member of this group is Rep. Liz Cheney, who faces Trump-endorsed attorney Harriet Hageman and a few minor contenders in the August primary to serve as the sole representative for dark-red Wyoming.
title: House Republicans all lead their challengers in recent fundraising

sentence: But Cheney remains formidable, with a powerful family name and more than a 6-1 cash-on-hand advantage as of March 31 over trial attorney Harriet Hageman.
author:
Mary Ellen McIntire
Stephanie Akin
Kate Ackley
Niels Lesniewski
title: Multiple threats mean there's no shortage of vulnerable House members
